original_text: Instead, Johanan son of Kareah and all the army officers led away all the remnant of Judah who had come back to live in the land of Judah from all the nations where they had been scattered.
korean_text: 가레아의 아들 요하난과 모든 군 지휘관이 유다의 남은 자 곧 쫓겨났던 여러 나라 가운데에서 유다 땅에 살려 하여 돌아온 자

sentences.original_text: led away all the remnant of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 모든 남은 자들을 이끌고 갔으며

sentences.original_text: who had come back to live in the land of Judah
from all the nations where they had been scattered
